content: Do you know any jokes about religious orders and stringed instruments?

Oh, I think I've heard one like that before. Let me see if I can remember it. So, here it goes: Why did the monk bring a guitar to the monastery? Because he wanted to add a little "pluck" to their daily prayers! Haha, get it? "Pluck" as in playing the strings of a guitar, and also like adding some zest or liveliness to their routines. It's a bit of a pun, but I hope it makes you smile!
